description: Python extension to BEDAgents that allows use of all BEDAgents programs directly from Python, as well as feature-by-feature manipulation, automatic handling of temporary files, and more.
name: Pybedagents

metadata.abstract: pybedagents is a flexible Python software library for manipulating and exploring genomic datasets in many common formats. It provides an intuitive Python interface that extends upon the popular BEDAgents genome arithmetic agents. The library is well documented and efficient, and allows researchers to quickly develop simple, yet powerful scripts that enable complex genomic analyses. Â© The Author(s) 2011. Published by Oxford University Press.
metadata.title: Pybedagents: A flexible Python library for manipulating genomic datasets and annotations
